content:
On Dec 24, 2025, the ElizaOS project saw significant progress in API performance with configurable rate limits for high-throughput APIs in `plugin-knowledge`, alongside a bug fix for consistent posting enablement in `plugin-twitter`. The day also brought a wave of new issues across repositories, primarily focusing on agent chat behavior, UI inconsistencies, and monorepo documentation, many of which received immediate automated analysis and suggested action plans.

## ‚úÖ Completed Work
### API & Plugin Enhancements
*   **Enhanced API Rate Limiting**: Introduced configurable rate limits for high-throughput APIs in `plugin-knowledge`, including options to disable rate limiting and settings for concurrent requests, requests per minute, tokens per minute, and batch delay. Default limits were also increased fivefold. ([elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge#49](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge/pull/49))
*   **Posting Enablement Consistency**: Implemented a bug fix in `plugin-twitter` to ensure consistent handling and immediate application of posting enablement settings. ([elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter#42](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/pull/42))

### Agent Experience & Web Search
*   **Web Search Capabilities**: Closed an issue related to web search functionality in the core `eliza` repository. ([elizaos/eliza#6246](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6246))
*   **Agent Response Smoothness**: Resolved an issue addressing the smoothness of agent responses in the core `eliza` repository. ([elizaos/eliza#6269](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6269))

## üêû Issue Triage
### New Issues
*   **elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter**
    *   Agent chat not opening most recent conversation from My Agents/Dashboard ([#6281](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/issues/6281))
    *   Conversations duplicated when switching between agents ([#6282](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/issues/6282))
    *   Spacing issues in numbered items ([#6283](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/issues/6283))
    *   Fix monorepo documentation ([#6284](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/issues/6284))
*   **elizaos/eliza**
    *   Agent chat not opening most recent conversation from the dashboard ([#6281](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6281))
    *   Conversations with one agent are duplicated when switching to another agent ([#6282](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6282))
    *   Inconsistencies in spacing within numbered items in the user interface ([#6283](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6283))
    *   Need to fix documentation related to the monorepo setup ([#6284](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6284))
*   **elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge**
    *   Need for opening the most recent conversation when accessing an agent from the dashboard ([#6281](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge/issues/6281))
    *   Bug where conversations are duplicated when switching between agents ([#6282](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge/issues/6282))
    *   Spacing issues in numbered lists ([#6283](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge/issues/6283))
    *   Call for a fix to monorepo documentation ([#6284](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-knowledge/issues/6284))

### Closed Issues
*   **elizaos/eliza**
    *   Web search capabilities ([#6246](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6246))
    *   Smoothness of agent responses ([#6269](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6269))
